title: [GAMEPLAY] Slayer Jinx Skin Particles bugged
body:
I've came across some enemy Slayer Jinxes and I've noticed that when they hit a minion the bullets dont disappear on time. they stay for a splitsecond more. Makes it very confusing. 

Forgot to make screens of it, but i'll try to get some soon.

Basicly how to check this bug is play as Slayer Jinx and auto attack a minion. You'll see when the AutoAttack on the minion stays a bit longer than needed.

replies.body:
Hey ITamotsu! 

Thanks for the report! I was able to reproduce this issue, so no worries about the screenshots. :] We're in the process of investigating the issue!
